testcase.classname: Test various functionalities of an application
testcase.name: Successful registration
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed When user navigates to sign in page.........................................passed And user clicks enters valid email..........................................passed And user click on create an account.........................................passed And user give all required registration details.............................passed And user clicks on register.................................................passed Then user should be able to register successfully...........................passed

testcase.classname: Test various functionalities of an application
testcase.name: Error displayed for invalid email address
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed When user navigates to sign in page.........................................passed And user enters invalid email...............................................passed And user click on create an account.........................................passed Then error message should be displayed......................................passed

testcase.classname: Test various functionalities of an application
testcase.name: Validate Summer Dresses Megamenu
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Dresses.................................................passed And user clicks on Summer Dresses...........................................passed Then user navigates Summer Dresses page.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Test various functionalities of an application
testcase.name: Sort summer dresses by price
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Dresses.................................................passed And user clicks on Summer Dresses...........................................passed And user clicks on Sort by price............................................passed Then items should be arranged accordingly...................................passed

testcase.classname: Test various functionalities of an application
testcase.name: Validate product details in the cart summary
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Dresses.................................................passed When user select a dress....................................................passed And user change the dress color to blue.....................................passed And user add the product to cart............................................passed Then user should see proper Details of the product in the cart summary......passed
